text: Dear friends, this is already the second letter I have written you, in which I am trying to stir up your pure mind by way of reminder:

I want you to <st data-num="3415" class="">recall</st><n id="1" /> both<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="4487" class="">predictions</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4280" class="">foretold</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1785" class="">commandment</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4990" class="">Savior</st> through <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="4413">Above all</st>, <st data-num="1097" class="">understand</st> <st data-num="3778">this</st>:<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">In</st> the <st data-num="2078" class="">last</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st> <st data-num="1701" class="">blatant</st> <st data-num="1703" class="">scoffers</st><n id="2" /> will <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st>, being <st data-num="4198" class="">propelled</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2398">their own</st> <st data-num="1939">evil urges</st><n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="4226">Where</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1860" class="">promised</st> <st data-num="3952" class="">return</st>?<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="575 3739">ever since</st><n id="3" /> our <st data-num="3962" class="">ancestors</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="2837" class="">died</st>,<n id="5" /> <st data-num="3956">all things</st> have <st data-num="1265" class="">continued</st> <st data-num="3779" class="">as</st> they were<n id="6" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="746" class="">beginning</st> of <st data-num="2937" class="">creation</st>.”

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> <st data-num="2309">deliberately</st> <st data-num="2990" class="">suppress</st> <st data-num="3778">this fact</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> by the <st data-num="3056" class="">word</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3772" class="">heavens</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">existed</st> <st data-num="1597">long ago</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> an <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st><n id="3" /> was <st data-num="4921" class="">formed</st> <st data-num="1537">out of</st> <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by means of</st> <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st>.

<st data-num="1223" class="">Through</st> <st data-num="3739">these things</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> existing <st data-num="5119">at that time</st> was <st data-num="622" class="">destroyed</st> when it was <st data-num="2626" class="">deluged</st> with <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st>.
But by the same word the present heavens and earth have been reserved for fire, by being kept for the day of judgment and destruction of the ungodly.
Now, dear friends, do not let this one thing escape your notice, that a single day is like a thousand years with the Lord and a thousand years are like a single day.

The <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> is <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="1019" class="">slow</st> concerning his <st data-num="1860" class="">promise</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> <st data-num="2233" class="">regard</st> <st data-num="1022" class="">slowness</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> is being <st data-num="3114" class="">patient</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">toward</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> because he does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1014" class="">wish</st><n id="2" /> for <st data-num="5100" class="">any</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="622" class="">perish</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> for <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> to <st data-num="5562" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3341" class="">repentance</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> will <st data-num="2240" class="">come</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="2812" class="">thief;</st> when it comes,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3772" class="">heavens</st> will <st data-num="3928" class="">disappear</st><n id="2" /> with a <st data-num="4500">horrific noise</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1161">and</st> the <st data-num="4747">celestial bodies</st><n id="4" /> will <st data-num="3089">melt away</st><n id="5" /> in a <st data-num="2741" class="">blaze</st>,<n id="6" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> every <st data-num="2041" class="">deed</st> done <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st><n id="7" /> will be <st data-num="2147">laid bare</st>.<n id="8" />

Since <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st> are to <st data-num="3089">melt away</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3779">in this manner</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4217">what sort of</st> people <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> you<n id="3" /> <st data-num="5225" class="">be</st>, <st data-num="391" class="">conducting</st> your <st data-num="391" class="">lives</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="40" class="">holiness</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2150" class="">godliness</st>,<n id="4" />

while <st data-num="4328">waiting for</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4692" class="">hastening</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3952" class="">coming</st> of the <st data-num="2250">day</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>?<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1223">Because of</st> <st data-num="3739">this day</st>,<n id="3" /> the <st data-num="3772" class="">heavens</st> will be <st data-num="4448">burned up</st> and<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3089" class="">dissolve</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4747">celestial bodies</st><n id="5" /> will <st data-num="5080">melt away</st> in a <st data-num="2741" class="">blaze</st>!<n id="6" />
But, according to his promise, we are waiting for new heavens and a new earth, in which righteousness truly resides.
Therefore, dear friends, since you are waiting for these things, strive to be found at peace, without spot or blemish, when you come into his presence.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="2233" class="">regard</st> the <st data-num="3115" class="">patience</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2531" class="">as</st> <st data-num="4991" class="">salvation</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2531">just as</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="27" class="">dear</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1125" class="">wrote</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">according to</st> the <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,

<st data-num="2980" class="">speaking</st> of these things <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> his <st data-num="1992">letters</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5100" class="">Some things</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">these letters</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1425">hard to understand</st>, <st data-num="5100" class="">things</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="261" class="">ignorant</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="793" class="">unstable</st> <st data-num="4761" class="">twist</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2398" class="">own</st> <st data-num="684" class="">destruction</st>, <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> they <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> do to the <st data-num="3062" class="">rest</st> of the <st data-num="1124" class="">scriptures</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st>, <st data-num="27">dear friends</st>, since <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> have been <st data-num="4267" class="">forewarned</st>,<n id="1" /> be <st data-num="5442" class="">on</st> your <st data-num="5442" class="">guard</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> you do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> get <st data-num="4879">led astray</st> by the <st data-num="4106" class="">error</st> of these <st data-num="113">unprincipled men</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="1601" class="">fall</st> from <st data-num="2398" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4740">firm grasp</st> on the truth.<n id="3" />
But grow in the grace and knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ. To him be the honor both now and on that eternal day.
